name: 3D Printer
reason: A 3D printer allows us to create custom robot parts and prototypes, enhancing our design capabilities and learning experience.

name: Outreach Event iPads
reason: Having a larger quantity of iPads would allow us to further the STEM education in the community, providing high-quality STEM education is one of our larger commitments, and we hope to inspire a younger generation into the world of robotics, and computer science. This item does include distribution of promotional materials at events. Please contact us for this item, or similar.
